subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Eagles cornerback Asante Samuel left Saturday morning’s practice with a strained hamstring. He was hurt while working in seven-on-seven drills during the team’s first practice in full pads this summer.
snippet: Philadelphia Eagles cornerback Asante Samuel left Saturday morning’s practice with a strained hamstring. He was hurt while working in seven-on-seven drills during the team’s first practice in full pads this summer.
